title: Using Your UA Band | Under Armour HealthBox
description:
In this video, learn how to use your UA Band.

UA HealthBox™ is the world’s first Connected Fitness system, created specifically to measure, monitor, and manage the factors that determine HOW YOU FEEL. UA HealthBox™ tracks and analyzes your sleep, daily activity, the intensity of your workouts, and weight. The UA Record™ app collects all this data into one dashboard showing your progress in real-time.

asset.title: Using Your UA Band | Under Armour HealthBox
asset.description:
In this video, learn how to use your UA Band.

For more about UA HealthBox, visit: http://undrarmr.co/1RtqEZK

UA HealthBox™ is the world’s first Connected Fitness system, created specifically to measure, monitor, and manage the factors that determine HOW YOU FEEL. UA HealthBox™ tracks and analyzes your sleep, daily activity, the intensity of your workouts, and weight. The UA Record™ app collects all this data into one dashboard showing your progress in real-time.
asset.author: Under Armour

transcripts: Your ua band has a touchscreen that navigates you for all your activity sleep heart rate and fitness see what you can do with your ua band tap the arrow on the right to access settings tap the battery icon to check battery life tap the clock icon to set a timer stopwatch set an alarm or access your calendar. Tap the Settings icon to adjust brightness phone connectivity airplane mode and power. From your home screen swipe once to see your activity tap to see your distance traveled calories burned and steps taken. Swipe again to see you sleep tap to manually log hit the play button when you're headed to bed and stop when you wake up you have the option to save it or not swipe again to get your resting heart rate be sure you have the band sitting a finger with from your wrist to get the most accurate read swipe once more for fitness tap to see your workout options running cycling and gym workout you can choose whatever you want the fourth business mode to be straight from the ua record app
